original_text:
African Quest
Informazioni generali
Software: Microgaming & Triple Edge Studios
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 1024
Giocata minima: € 0,10
Giocata massima: € 15
Minimo gettoni per linea: 1
Vincita massima: 84.000 €/ 5.600 volte la puntata
Return ti Player (RTP): 96,52%
Volatilità: alta
Tema, grafica, scommesse e RTP
African Quest è una nuova slot machine della Microgaming prodotta in collaborazione con la Triple Edge Studios. Si tratta di un gioco a tema africano, non particolarmente originale ma ben realizzato e con alcune caratteristiche che lo rendono apprezzabile e coinvolgente.
Per quanto riguarda il compartimento grafico, African Quest sviluppa al meglio la tematica safari con un mix di simboli che abbiamo visto spesso in passato: alberi africani, elefanti, giraffe, zebre, rinoceronti e mappe dell’Africa si alternano sui rulli, accanto alle lettere e ai numeri che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco, riprodotte seguendo la grafica del tema.
Il range di scommesse di questa slot machine non è molto ampio, si possono infatti effettuare le proprie puntate a partire da 10 centesimi fino a 15 €, una cifra abbastanza bassa che ci farebbe pensare a premi ugualmente di scarso valore. In realtà, nonostante questo intervallo ristretto di puntate, African Quest è un gioco caratterizzato da un’alta volatilità (cosa peraltro non consueta per le slot machine di casa Microgaming), il che significa che sebbene le vincite non siano così frequenti si potranno portare a casa delle discrete somme, come per esempio la vincita massima pari a 84.000 € (ben 5.600 volte il valore della puntata).
L’RTP (il ritorno teorico al giocatore) non è sbalorditivo ma si attesta su un abbastanza canonico 96,52%.
Caratteristiche principali del gameplay
Il gameplay di African Quest non risulta essere molto articolato, anche se sono presenti delle funzioni speciali che lo arricchiscono, rendendo l’esperienza di gioco più coinvolgente e le vincite più gratificanti.
La prima funzione speciale che citiamo è quella che riteniamo più interessante, ossia la Hyperspin Feature: si tratta della possibilità di far girare nuovamente un rullo (a pagamento), per aumentare le chance di ottenere delle combinazioni vincenti.
La seconda special Feature è quella legata al simbolo Scatter, rappresentato dalla mappa dell’Africa, che a seconda del numero di volte in cui compare sui rulli (tre, quattro o cinque), regala un numero variabile di giri gratuiti e moltiplicatori a scelta del giocatore, secondo il seguente schema:

Scelta 1: 5, 10 oppure 15 giri gratuiti con moltiplicatore x3 o x4
Scelta 2: 8, 15 o 20 giri gratuiti con moltiplicatore x3 o x4
Scelta 3: 12, 25 o 40 giri gratuiti con moltiplicatore massimo x 2

Durante i giri gratuiti il valore massimo del moltiplicatore può poi aumentare, raggiungendo il valore di 64 volte la puntata e offrendo la possibilità di accedere al premio di 84.000 €
African Quest: conclusioni
African Quest è una slot machine ben lontana dall’originalità, non mancando nei cataloghi di praticamente tutte le software house dei giochi a tema Africa; nonostante ciò può rappresentare un’attrattiva per coloro che amano la funzione Hyperspin. Oltre a questo, il gameplay è abbastanza facile e intuitivo e ciò rende African Quest una slot machine adatta anche ai principianti, sebbene debba essere messo in conto che non sarà così semplice vincere in virtù dell’elevata volatilità.

raw_translation.response:
African Quest
General Information
Software: Microgaming & Triple Edge Studios
Reels: 5
Paylines: 1024
Minimum Bet: € 0.10
Maximum Bet: € 15
Minimum Coins per Line: 1
Maximum Win: € 84,000 / 5,600x bet
Return to Player (RTP): 96.52%
Volatility: high
Theme, Graphics, Betting and RTP
African Quest is a new Microgaming slot machine produced in collaboration with Triple Edge Studios. It's an African-themed game, not particularly original but well executed and with some features that make it enjoyable and engaging.
In terms of graphics, African Quest develops the safari theme to perfection with a mix of symbols that we've seen often in the past: African trees, elephants, giraffes, zebras, rhinoceroses, and Africa maps alternate on the reels, alongside letters and numbers which are reproduced following the theme's graphics.
The betting range of this slot machine is not very wide. Players can place their bets starting from 10 cents up to € 15, a relatively low amount that would make us think of prizes of equal value. In reality, despite this restricted range of bets, African Quest is a game characterized by high volatility (which is not typical for Microgaming slots), which means that even though the winnings are not frequent, one can still bring home substantial amounts, like the maximum win of € 84,000 (5,600 times the value of the bet).
The RTP (theoretical return to player) is not staggering but is still relatively standard at 96.52%.
Main Gameplay Features
The gameplay of African Quest is not highly complicated, although there are special features that enrich it, making the gaming experience more engaging and the wins more rewarding.
The first special function we'll mention is the most interesting one, the Hyperspin Feature. This refers to the possibility of re-spinning a reel (for a fee), to increase the chances of getting winning combinations.
The second special feature is related to the Scatter symbol, represented by the Africa map, which, depending on the number of times it appears on the reels (three, four or five), rewards players with a variable number of free spins and multipliers chosen by the player following the following scheme:

Choice 1: 5, 10 or 15 free spins with a 3x or 4x multiplier
Choice 2: 8, 15 or 20 free spins with a 3x or 4x multiplier
Choice 3: 12, 25 or 40 free spins with a maximum 2x multiplier

During free spins, the maximum value of the multiplier can increase, reaching 64 times the bet value, offering the chance to access the € 84,000 prize.
Conclusion
African Quest is a slot machine far from originality, as practically every software house offers Africa-themed games in their catalogs. Despite this, it can still be attractive for those who love the Hyperspin feature. Moreover, the gameplay is quite easy and intuitive, making African Quest suitable even for beginners, though one must consider that winning won't be easy due to the game's high volatility.

Theme, graphics, betting, and RTP
African Quest is a new slot machine from Microgaming produced in collaboration with Triple Edge Studios. It is an African-themed game, not particularly original but well-executed and with some features that make it enjoyable and engaging.

Regarding the graphics, African Quest develops the safari theme perfectly with a mix of symbols that we have often seen in the past: African trees, elephants, giraffes, zebras, rhinos, and African maps alternate on the reels, alongside letters and numbers referring to playing cards, reproduced following the graphics of the theme.

The range of bets for this slot machine is not very wide. You can place your bets starting from 10 cents up to 15 €. It seems like a low amount of money for valuable prizes. Still, in reality, despite this restricted range of bets, African Quest is a game characterized by high volatility (which is not usual for Microgaming slot machines), which means that although winnings are not so frequent, you can take home decent sums, like the maximum win of €84,000 (5,600 times the value of the bet).

The RTP (theoretical return to the player) is not amazing but remains at a rather standard 96.52%.

Main gameplay features
African Quest's gameplay is not very complicated, although some special functions enrich it, making the gaming experience more engaging and the winnings more rewarding.

The first special function we mention is the most interesting one, namely the Hyperspin Feature: It allows you to spin a reel again (for a fee) to increase your chances of getting winning combinations.

The second special feature is related to the Scatter symbol, represented by the map of Africa, which, depending on the number of times it appears on the reels (three, four, or five), gives a variable number of free spins and multipliers chosen by the player, according to the following scheme:

Choice 1: 5, 10, or 15 free spins with a multiplier of x3 or x4
Choice 2: 8, 15, or 20 free spins with a multiplier of x3 or x4
Choice 3: 12, 25, or 40 free spins with a maximum multiplier of x2

During free spins, the maximum value of the multiplier can increase, reaching the value of 64 times the bet, offering an opportunity to win the €84,000 prize.

African Quest: Conclusions
African Quest is a slot machine far from originality, as it is present in the catalogs of practically all software houses of Africa-themed games. However, it can represent an attraction for those who love the Hyperspin function. In addition, the gameplay is quite easy and intuitive, making African Quest suitable also for beginners, although it should be taken into account that winning due to the high volatility will not be so simple.
